MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a fault with the power in the DG9 postcode areas of Stranraer, Kirkcolm, Leswalt and surrounding areas. This is causing reduced power to a number of properties. We had no advance warning of this and only became aware of it at 4:40pm. Our emergency response team are now on their way to investigate & repair the fault and our team will work to get your power back to normal as quickly and as safely as possible by 7:45pm. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 5:08pm on Thursday, 24th December 2020.
